MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL12 Gresford and Llay areas of Wrexham affecting properties in Long Street, Singrett Hill and surrounding area. In order to complete repairs, following a powercut on 27th December,  engineers on site need to isolate the power at 11:30am and we expect the power to be restored by 2:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:50am on 28th December 2020.
